[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/update/movefmt.rs] [Lines: 128-136] [State recovery] If get_movefmt_path() fails to find the binary, is there a secure recovery mechanism, or could this be exploited to force installation from attacker-controlled sources? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/update/movefmt.rs] [Function: get_update_info()] [None handling] When current_version is None, is this properly handled in all code paths, or could it cause null pointer dereference equivalent issues in comparisons? (Low)
